long_description: Is it a pot, a mug or a bowl? It's all three! Behold the ultralight, all-in-one, cook-and-eat vessel for solo adventurers! Cook your meals in this handy solo pot, then eat right out of it; save weight by leaving an extra bowl at home. Flip-top lid features a convenient slot for draining pasta and rice without making a mess. A spork can slide into the same slot for packing. GigaPower 110 fuel and GigaPower Stove can be stored in the Trek 700, saving valuable pack space. Includes a mesh storage sack.
short_description: Is it a pot, a mug or a bowl? It's all three! Behold the ultralight, all-in-one, cook-and-eat vessel for solo adventurers!
